reviews.review: A story az pacek, a kiegészítők ára nem oké.
Con esta nueva entrega toda Valve trabajaría y se nota, el encanto del primer juego se multiplico hasta desbordarse. No te quejaras de jugarlo 3 veces como minimo.

SPOILER ALERT I have a problem, after turning on the blue gel pump i have to take an elevator, although, every time i try to take it the  game closes with a corrupt physical model banner.
can anyone help  me?

Una segunda entrega que es mejor en diferencia que la primera entrega. Cosa tipica de valve.

Valve, para que sepas que existen mas numeros despues de el 2. Pero prefiero que se mantenga asi porque la historia ha empezado y se ha cerrado bien.  Quien diga que no hay trama o que es para hacer relleno, es como decir que regueton esta mejor trabajado que la musica classica.  Dejando coñas a lado, su historia es tierna y sadica.

Sus mapas y fisicas son super hermosos a pesar de tener graficos antiguos.

10/10 esa saga tiene un 10 en sus dos entregas.

Игра офигенная,геймплей отличный,графика приятная для глаз,звук и музыка замечательны,главная героиня похорошела в лучшую сторону,порадовало ещё то что в новой части добавили гель,лазеры,гравитационные лифты а также мосты,оставили чёрный юмор на который обратить внимание не грех ну и конечно же GlaDoS чёрная юмористка которую мы все любим и уважаем.
剧情很不错，双人也很欢乐，还有DIY作图和创意工坊
It is indeed a very spicy game with lack of boredom

Everything in this game is absolutely heartwarming. Even the little robots with machine guns have their own cute personalities. I know I'm heavily late to the party but better late than never, right?

Fun fact: Portal 2 is the first game I have ever finished solo. Now I regret I didn't play through the original Portal first.
I love this game.  The puzzles, the game play and the story is excellent.  I highly recommend this game.
Если жизнь дала всё же лимоны, зделайте взрывной лимонад
legit my fav game of all time BUY THIS GAME
Divertido en modo coop e interesante en modo historia

Игра крутая но бесит моменты , Что забыла труба с преобразуещем гелем в логове  у Уитли,  как Гладос могла подсоединится без отключения  Уитли , или  Гладос  когда мы её  меняем  на уитли  зачем она активирует где ходит Челл  если она может активировать все  но это,  сломала  4-ую  стену  но за музыку  от турелей лайк :)
como o primeiro esse tambem é bom foi divertido. #Glados,waifu
one of the best single player games out there
love it! one of the best games I have ever played
Hermoso de principio a fin. Reí mucho con este juego, especialmente cuando lo pasas por segunda vez porque hay tantos detalles que se suele obviar.

historias e revira voltas muito boas, jogabilidade ótima e estou a anos jogando e não encontrei nenhum bug,
enfim esse jogo é maravilhoso

tghre was a funy potaeto woman and it made me alugh because she has to suffer for eternity
i dont know what this means buy this game

toaster wants another slice and i gave her two
10/10 turrets
é dificil encontrar um unico defeito nesse jogo

This is simply the best game I have ever played.

I could list a million reasons why you should play this game, but you'll find all of those in another review. The fact is Portal 2 is a video game staple and a must-play for everyone!
Very cool game! I love the portal mechanic and the story, and just the game in general. Keep up the good work!
Truly a Great Game, When I was done I was satisfied.
made me rage like a mother----er. 10/10 would recommend to everyone

It's Portal.
I think they also removed some of my least favorite puzzles that were heavily reliant on timing.
gun shoot. gun no real gun, gun shoot door. grug like.
As a Mac user, I could not look up or down using mouse or keyboard. the mouse would not bind to up or down. The keys would bind but they did not function. Any suggestions on how to fix?

I thought this game was fun...... for a few hours. The games dialouge and puzzles are great but there is barley any replayability after you finish the story. The coop is fun but its really short. Anyway get this game on sale if you can.
trais bon jeux de puzzle en fps avec une histoire comtpréancible
Oynarken inanılmaz keyif aldığım oyundur. Herkese öneririm.
прикольная игра хорошие шутки и озвучка
Kesinlikle ilk oyundan çok daha güzel. Bu sefer hikaye kısmına daha fazla ağırlık vermeleri de oyunu daha sürükleyici yapıyor.
балдёжно, перепрохожу уже 5 раз и не надоедает
omg compralo se hai i soldi
tek oynamadım ama arkadaşla mükemmel co op için ayrı story çizmiş adanlar muhteşem

“el juego es muy disfrutable, las peleas son buenas y la historia no llega a ser mal.”
- Rost Zlis (2019)

Oyunun tek oyunculusunu baştan sona bitirmiş biri olarak şunu söylemeliyim: Bir oyunun eğer hikayesi çok güzel fakat bunu yansıtma biçimi o kadar iyi değilse o oyun güzel bir oyun olabilir, keza aynı olay bunun tam tersi içinde geçerlidir. Fakat bir oyunun hem hikayesi hemde betimlemesi aynı oranda iyiyse o oyuna şaheser denir. Özetle demek istediğim Portal 2 bir şaheser ve benim şaheserler hakkındaki fikrim herkesin bunları deneyimlemesi yönünde. Bu nedenle bu oyunu en yakın zamanda alın ve deneyimleyin. Pişman olacağınızı düşünmüyorum.
Excellent jeu, je suis passé de 96 de Q.I a 132. merci
Jogo muito bom, puzzles pra pensar bastante e o humor e muito bom. RECOMENDO
Шикарная игра, может даже единственная в своем роде,первый раз прошел эту игру лет 10 назад и сейчас проходил с удовольствием как в первый раз.

Loved this game. I ruined my first playthrough as I didn't focus on the story and didn't understand it but I now know the story.

I love custom map building its so fun and well made.

DEFINITELY GET THIS MASTERPIECE
Great follow-up to the first one!  Would recommend.
